intro: Ornithopus durus, commonly known as the hardstem rocket, is a flowering plant native to the western United States and parts of Canada. It is a member of the Brassicaceae family, which includes many other cruciferous plants. The plant typically grows in dry, open habitats such as grasslands and disturbed soils. Its slender stems and small, yellow flowers bloom in late spring to early summer. Ornithopus durus is characterized by its hairy foliage and is often found in arid or semi-arid environments.
